tr.td: Initial Antibiotic Selection for Community-Acquired Pneumonia (CAP) in Immunocompetent Patients

externalDocument.text: Initial Antibiotic Selection for Community-Acquired Pneumonia (CAP) in Immunocompetent Patients

tr.td: Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Respiratory infection - Tuberculosis of lung, confirmed histologically (disorder)
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Chronic bronchitis - CHRONIC BRONCHITIS NEC
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Lymphocytic leukemia - Acute lymphoblastic leukemia not having achieved remission
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Myelodysplasia - Other specified congenital anomalies of spinal cord
Intervention, Performed: Hospital Measures - Comfort Measures Only Intervention - palliative course of radiotherapy
Patient Characteristic Payer: Payer - Refusal to Pay/Bad Debt
Encounter, Performed: Hospital Measures-Encounter Inpatient - admission to private hospital
Procedure, Performed: Hospital Measures-Systemic Chemotherapy - Chemotherapy Procedure
Encounter, Performed: Encounter Inpatient - admission to ward
Intervention, Performed: Hospital Measures-Ventilator care - ventilator care and adjustment
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures - Any infection - EMPYEMA W/O FISTULA
Procedure, Performed: Peritoneal Dialysis-Procedure - Empty and measure peritoneal dialysis fluid (procedure)
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Structural lung disease - Tuberculous fibrosis of lung
Encounter, Performed: Hospital Measures-Nursing home or extended care facility - routine admission to hospice
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Lymphoma - Malignant neoplasm of lymphoid, hematopoietic and related tissue, unspecified
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV Quinolones Antipneumococcal - Levofloxacin 5 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Immunodeficiency syndrome - Human immunodeficiency virus [HIV] disease
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV Aminoglycosides - Amikacin Sulfate 50 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV or IM Aztreonam - Aztreonam 20 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Chronic lymphocytic leukemia - Lymphoid leukemia chronic in remission
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Emphysema - Obstructive emphysema (disorder)
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Myeloma - Multiple myeloma not having achieved remission
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Organ transplant recipient - History of tissue/organ transplant
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Healthcare associated pneumonia - PNEUMONIA OTH SPCF BACT
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV or IM Beta lactams - Cefotaxime 40 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Medication, Allergy: Hospital Measures-Beta lactams for allergy determination - Cefadroxil 1000 MG Oral Tablet
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Myelogenic leukemia - Myelodysplastic syndrome, unspecified
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Human immunodeficiency virus - Acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS) (disorder)
Diagnosis, Inactive: Hospital Measures-Cystic fibrosis - CYSTIC FIBROSIS W/O ILEUS
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV Antipneumococcal/antipseudomonal beta lactams - Clarithromycin 50 MG/ML Injectable Suspension
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Restrictive lung disease - restrictive lung disease
Transfer From: Hospital Measures-Ambulatory surgical center - ambulatory surgery center
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV or PO Macrolides Non-ICU - Erythromycin Ethylsuccinate 200 MG Chewable Tablet
Encounter, Performed: Hospital Measures-Encounter ED - Emergency department patient visit
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV Antipseudomonal quinolones - Ciprofloxacin 10 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Pancytopenia - Pancytopenia
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV PO Quinolone Antipneumococcal - Levofloxacin 750 MG Oral Tablet
Intervention, Performed: Hospital Measures-Tracheostomy care - tracheostomy care
Procedure, Performed: Hospital Measures-Organ transplant - Liver transplant status
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Respiratory failure acute or chronic - primary atelectasis, in perinatal period (disorder)
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV or PO Antimicrobial Medications - colistimethate 40 MG/ML Inhalant Solution
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-COPD - Emphysema, unspecified
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Neutropenia - Other neutropenia
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Septicemia - SEPTICEMIA NOS
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV Levofloxacin - Levofloxacin 25 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Bronchiecstasis - Bronchiectasis without acute exacerbation
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Pneumonia - PNEUMO OTH GRM-NEG BACT
Transfer From: Hospital Measures-Acute care hospital - medical intensive care unit
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Acquired immune deficiency syndrome - Human immunodeficiency virus [HIV] disease
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Interstital lung disease - Interstitial pulmonary disease, unspecified
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV Macrolides ICU - erythromycin lactobionate 4 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-AIDS related complex - Human immunodeficiency virus [HIV] disease
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV Beta lactams - Piperacillin 60 MG/ML / tazobactam 7.5 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Presumptive pneumonia - Pneumonia due to other specified organism
Medication, Administered: Hospital Measures-IV or PO Tetracyclines - tigecycline 10 MG/ML Injectable Solution
Encounter, Performed: Hospital Measures - Encounter ED - Emergency department patient visit
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Cystic fibrosis - CYSTIC FIBROSIS W GI MAN
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Leukemia - Unspecified leukemia, without mention of having achieved remission
Procedure, Performed: Hemodialysis-Procedure - Intermittent hemodialysis with continuous ultrafiltration (procedure)
Diagnosis, Active: Hospital Measures-Congenital or hereditary immunodeficiency - Unspecified disorder of immune mechanism
